message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against us.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. How about a more even split this time? Time is money, after all!
Bob, I need to factor in inflation which hurts me more than you.  This is my counter-offer.  Let's close this deal.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
